title: Bulgaria Is at the Heart of Europe’s Harsh New Approach to Immigration
summary_full: This former military barracks in Bulgaria has become a symbol of the E.U.’s increasingly strict policing of its borders — and of what may come next.
summary_public: This former military barracks in Bulgaria has become a symbol of the E.U.’s increasingly strict policing of its borders — and of what may come next.

BG.label: positive
